hadith.text: Abu Dawud said:I read out to Sa'id b. Ya'qub al-Taliqini who said: Abu Tumailah transmitted to us, saying: Muhammad b. Ishaq transmitted to us saying: 'Ata reported Jabir b. 'Abd Allah as saying: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) fixed; and he mentioned the tradition like that of Musa; he said: And those who possess corn food should pay something which I do not remember
